short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds color highlighting to your TCGPlayer Order List. Works on both old and new UIs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will add color highlighting to the Orders list in the TCGPlayer Admin panel to help draw attention to Expedited, International, In Store Pickup, Presale, and orders over $49.99.

It now works with both the old and new UIs.
